评论详情: Since loungefly does not make WWE bags I was forced to make one of my own. The process was easy and the product came out perfectly the perfect size. The image is clear, crisp and positioned perfectly. I’m in love.

I am very pleased with how my image printed. The quality of the bag is nice as well. I've used this product now for several months and it has held up very well considering how much junk I put in there. The only weak spot is inside the bag where there is a thin material to divide space. But it conceals my pew pew, so the material is tearing from the seam a bit but that is expected since my pew pew is so heavy. The size is kinda smaller than I hoped for but it is a really great bag. It turned out great! My QR code scans really well. I am very happy with this product over all. Highly recommend for the quality of the print and the quality make of the bag itself . Very durable, other than the inside piece which I assume was not intended for a pew pew. I can reinforce myself. ☺️ Get you one!!
